reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater well-made and perfect for ugly sweater parties, noting it's super soft, thick, and very warm.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and soft
items.body: Nice quality, super warm, well made and cute design. Read more
items.author: Trinket

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Too Comfy and Stylish to be called Uglyüòâ
items.body: I paid a little more than I wanted but it is a GREAT quality sweater that is so soft and comfy to wear. I really love it and the longer length makes for a great look. I would NOT call it an ugly sweater at all! I‚Äôm going to wear the heck out of it this season! Read more
items.author: carol willette

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Christmas and Holiday Sweater
items.body: I don‚Äôt call this Christmas sweater ugly but beautifully designed and becoming; perfect for the holidays. It is a nice quality knit and very long and functional forFall and Winter weather. Read more
items.author: Marylouise Peacock

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice quality sweater the color is vibrant and true red.
items.body: Very nice quality. The sweater is not too thick but feels lightweight enough to feel dressy. It has an expensive feel to it and lays very nicely. The reason I gave it a 4 is because it is much longer than I thought it would be. I‚Äôm 5 ft 2 and 119 lbs. I ordered the xl so it would feel roomy. That might make it a little longer than it would have been in a smaller size. I still like it and think it will be warm and fun to wear for the Christmas activities. Read more
items.author: Novella

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality fabric. Not ugly at all.
items.body: This sweater way exceeded my expectations. I ordered at the last minute for a party. I was not expecting it to be as nice as it was. The material was much thicker than I thought it would be. I ordered an XL and it fit perfect. I kept it unbuttoned as I wore it with dress pants but could easily look great buttoned and with leggings as it is long enough. Great deal for the money. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: Gabrielle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute holiday cardigan
items.body: I ordered this ugly Christmas sweater cardigan in an XL to get a relaxed, oversized look and it did not disappoint! The material has a nice weight to it and feels well made. The pattern is super cute, and it‚Äôs thicker than I expected, which I really appreciated. I received so many compliments and would absolutely purchase this again. Read more
items.author: Monique

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas sweater
items.body: I purchased this sweater to wear to a holiday gathering at a friend‚Äôs home. It‚Äôs very comfortable and a soft feel and looks nice on. It‚Äôs also warm. The design and shade of red really makes this an attractive sweater; I wouldn‚Äôt refer to it as ‚Äúugly.‚Äù Read more
items.author: Chatterbox

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Holiday Sweater & Warm
items.body: I got this for an unusually cheap price and thought I‚Äôd take a chance at what I got. The pics looked like it would be cute for my cold office. I was correct, it is a cute holiday sweater. But I did not expect that it would also be so well made and warm for the cheap price that I paid. Bonus! Read more
items.author: Must_Have_Coffee!

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Deep Red Cake, Red, White Christmas Tree, Black-b, Multicolor, Black, Red and White Striped Deer, White Red Jolly Xmas, Green, Black-a. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
